name: IndustriNatura: Between Two Worlds
description:
Welcome to IndustriNatura: Between Two Worlds. Here you face a world of contrast and duality. Nature against machine, organic against mechanical, or something in between? Solving puzzles that ultimately changes the world around you,  you'll see the map transform around you based on your decisions. What will you choose; what will your world look like?

List of features:
Interactive puzzles
World that transforms based on your actions
Soundstrack that changes based on your actions

This prototype was developed at the Global Game Jam 2022
